profile_positions.description: Development of new version of Memsic software, which allows simulating multicomponent gas membrane permeation. This software is available in the form of a CAPE-OPEN module, being compatible with the majority of process simulators (such as Aspen plus, Simsci Pro/II..) and in a standalone version.

profile_positions.title: Assistant de recherche

company.name: IFP Energies nouvelles
company.description:
IFP Energies nouvelles (IFPEN) est un acteur majeur de la recherche et de la formation dans les domaines de l’énergie, du transport et de l’environnement. De la recherche à l’industrie, l’innovation technologique est au cœur de son action, articulée autour de quatre priorités stratégiques : climat, environnement et économie circulaire - énergies renouvelables - mobilité durable et hydrocarbures responsables.
---------------------------------

IFP Energies nouvelles (IFPEN) is a major research and training player in the fields of energy, transport and the environment. From research to industry, technological innovation is central to all its activities, structured around four strategic priorities: climate, environment and circular economy, renewable energies, sustainable mobility and responsible oil and gas.
